pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, June 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, June 19, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

Private appointments.

Media Appearance

The Prime Minister will appear in CUT-OFF, a special VICELAND Canada documentary on Canadaâ€™s isolated Indigenous communities, to be broadcast at 10:00 p.m. ET on VICELAND/CITY-TV and on viceland.com
